title: [Zul Logoth, Sapphire Tunnel]
description: Traffic steadily moves north, east and southwest through this tunnel junction.  A small brown door nestles unobtrusively into the west wall next to a wide glass window.  Dwarves, particularly children, move up to press their noses against the window's glass and stare in at the displays.  Then they either happily enter the shop or they move along, usually with a sigh and a wistful expression, and go about their business.
location: the tunnels and caverns of Zul Logoth
